abstract.t: This document proposes a general method to avoid loops while settingup Label Switched Paths (LSPs), and is applicable to both unicast andmulticast label setup. The approach taken is to solve the problem ofconstructing a tree for delivering data. The solution verifies thepath towards the root of the tree is loop free before a node isgrafted to the tree. This loop avoidance scheme complements loopdetection in LDP.
